title: March of the pronghorns
caption: March of the pronghorns
desc: As the days lengthen and spring flowers bloom, herds of pronghorns in the mountainous western US state of Wyoming migrate north from their winter grounds to Grand Teton National Park. This 150-mile journey across public and private land has been dubbed the 'path of the pronghorn' and has been followed since prehistoric times.
